channel.title: Please atleast read and try to help me with my connection problem! (prize)
channel.description:
Ok well I port forwarded my 2wirw 1701g gateway modem and made a no-ip and downloaded the DUC no-ip thing and when I compile run my server only I can log in and yes I tried using utorrent and I also port forwarded my firewall and even tried shutting it off still same thing the only one that can log in is me... please help me!
I portforwarded with the right port and everything but the only one who can log in is me : :confused: :(
if you can help me and it works im offering a prize of a rs acc (i quit rs) it is lvl 96 user is cut for gd

item.title: Please atleast read and try to help me with my connection problem! (prize)
item.dc:creator: @zech2005007 zech2005007
item.description:
@zech2005007 wrote:

maybe your ip is broken? you should update on the no-ip wesite. delete your host and make a new one. (can still be the same name) and when your on DUC no-ip make sure the smileys are grinning big or blushing, and it can also be that you havent set your environment variables.

Hope This Helped.

Read full topic
item.source: Please atleast read and try to help me with my connection problem! (prize)

item.title: Please atleast read and try to help me with my connection problem! (prize)
item.dc:creator: @Rog3r Rog3r
item.description:
@Rog3r wrote:

No and try shutting off your firewall or opening the firewall to allow connection via the port.

u couldnt of port fowarded right also make sure runserver.bat and no-ip are both running also on no-ip check the box is it blushing? try tht? if it still dosent work u need to re-portfoward hope this helped
